first

public final int first()
Description copied from interface: IHouseholder
Regardless of what is actually returned by doubleValue(int) or get(int) vector elements with indeces less than 'first' should be assumed to be, and treated as if they are zero.

Specified by:
first in interface IHouseholder<N extends Number>
Returns:
The index of the first non-zero Householder vector element.
